title: Can I not have the MAC in game window minimise when I Cmd + Tab?
body:
Just wondering if anyone else experiences this and if there is any way around it.
So playing LoL on Mac with 2 monitors. I have League in game full screen on my main desktop and often another webpage, stream or music etc open on my second monitor.
However when I Cmd + Tab (Alt + Tab for windows) my League game minimises until I Cmd + Tab back to it again and it reappears. 
Just wondering if there is an ability to Cmd + Tab to another screen while the in game client remains active on my main desktop but I would be able to actively use the second monitor and client etc.
Thanks in advance, it's hard to find Mac support items that are relevant because I know we are the unloved counsins :)

replies.body:
Hey Sportsta,

Try running League of Legends in Windowed Borderless mode. Hopefully that's what you're looking for?
